name: OR_LNLG_SCD_ACSRY
description: This table contains SCD (Sequential Compression Device) accessories documented during a surgical case.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCD_ACCESSORY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the sequential compression device (SCD) accessory.
